headline.main: Mixed Smoke Signals in San Francisco

docs.abstract: A Board of Supervisors committee rejects new restrictions on tobacco sales in the city.
docs.lead_paragraph: Last weekend, San Francisco's new antismoking ordinance-which bans smoking in public places like bus stop shelters, outdoor dining areas and A.T.M. lines - went into effect.
docs.snippet: A Board of Supervisors committee rejects new restrictions on tobacco sales in the city.
